author: cbs8
title: Nexteer Automotive Announces Global Investors Conference Call to Discuss 2015 Interim Results
text:
Nexteer Automotive
SAGINAW, Mich. , Aug. 25, Nexteer Automotive, a global leader in intuitive motion control, announced today that it will host a Global Investors Conference Call at 8:00 a.m. EDT ( 8:00 p.m. HKT) on Thursday, August 27, 2015 , to discuss the company's 2015 interim results.
Speakers on the call from Nexteer Automotive will be Mike Richardson , executive director and senior vice president, Strategy, and Joe Perkins , senior vice president and CFO.
The conference call dial-in information is posted on Nexteer's website in the Investor Calendar: http://www.nexteer.com/investor-calendar/ .
ABOUT NEXTEER
Nexteer Automotive (HK:1316) is a multi-billion dollar global steering and driveline business solely dedicated to electric and hydraulic steering systems, steering columns and driveline products for original equipment manufacturers. The company is listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. Its 12,000 workforce serves more than 50 customers in every major region of the world. The company has 21 manufacturing plants, five regional engineering centers and 10 customer service centers strategically located in North and South America , Europe and Asia . Nexteer Automotive's customers include BMW, Fiat Chrysler, Ford, GM, PSA Peugeot Citroen, Toyota, and VW, as well as automakers in India and China . www.nexteer.com
